committee_info.name: Built Environment
committee_info.description: Ensures the architectural integrity, aesthetic appeal, and overall quality of Villa Capriani's buildings, landscapes, and shared spaces, supporting owners with guidance and resources.
committee_info.charter: To maintain and enhance the architectural standards and aesthetic appeal of Villa Capriani while supporting owners with improvement projects.

responsibilities: Review, approve, and oversee exterior architectural and landscaping projects
Review, approve, and oversee interior design and improvement projects
Provide guidance and assistance to owners with improvement or repair projects
Ensure compliance with approved design standards, strategic plans, and community vision
